attributes.action: MPs act rationally by ensuring Brexit decision is made once the terms are known.
attributes.additional_details: Whether you are for or against the UK's departure from the European Union, it is surely in the interests of all of us that we make the final decision in the light of the fullest possible information. Remaining locked into a decision based upon only what we knew at the time of the first referendum is surely irrational. Please fight for the rational course be taken. The British people deserve no less.
attributes.background: We urge MPs to take the rational course on Brexit and ensure that a final decision is made conditional upon either a vote in parliament or a referendum, following a full public debate once the terms of the negotiation have been completed and the wideranging implications fully assessed.
